description: Without dbus installed you cannot start/stop/restart/status the nova services
title: Release deb pkg for nova missing dependency on dbus

comments.content: Without dbus installed you cannot start/stop/restart/status the nova services
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tim-dysinger

comments.content:
Which "release deb pkg" are you using ?

The Ubuntu packages ship with upstart scripts, and upstart depends on dbus. upstart is in Ubuntu minimal, so dbus also is -- and you don't have to depend on packages in minimal (since they are always present)...

In all cases sounds like a packaging issue, not a nova one.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: @Tim, thanks for the prompt answer -- What platform are you deploying those on ? All of {lucid,maverick,natty,oneiric} have a strong dep on dbus (due to using upstart).
